game.name: The Ticino Adventure Tour
game.description:
In this one of the best adventure games for boys, you would have lots of fun and thrill to explore on the amazing platform. Would you like to try it out and create your best score to show off the world that you are the best adventure player in the world? Join The Ticino Adventure Tour game and be prepared to guide a little character who has left his home for a new mission. Your enemies are everywhere â€“ on the plane and in the air.

Remember you would have only three lives to use and be careful when your character gets ready to run over the platform. Jump and reach over the other platform to grab your coins and avoid the spikes! Try to keep your character away from the enemies since only a touch can cause lose your life! Time is running over the top middle portion of the screen. Hey friends! Flying birds can also harm your character so try to keep him away!

Try to grab as many coins or power as you can to boost your score and make your character stronger! Track your score by looking at the top left corner of the screen in this HTML5 platform game! Your path is full of obstacles and deadly hindrances so you need to be alert all the time. We cover countless free adventure games that are enough skilled to beat your boredom when you are staying at home due to any reason. Good luck preparing your best new score and have fun with your friends and family!
